test_cases.name: TC-BT1. Given partyLookup is skipped And there are 2 transfers with the same receiver fspid in the request and acceptParty, acceptQuote is true for both the requests, When the receiver fsp fails the entire transfer batch, Then the callback response should have the party and quote results and a failure for transfer

assertions.description: Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check overall bulk transaction state is COMPLETED

test_cases.name: BT-3. Given partyLookup is skipped And there are 2 transfers with the same receiver fspid in the request, And acceptParty, acceptQuote is true for both the requests , When Payee fsp sends response for only one of the transfers instead of 2 transfers, Then the callback response should only have the party and quote results for the transfer that payee fsp did not send the response and for the other transfer where payee fsp sent the transfer response should has party, quote and transfer results

assertions.description: Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check overall bulk transaction state is COMPLETED

test_cases.name: TC-BT4. Given partyLookup is skipped And there are 2 transfers with the same receiver fspid in the request, And acceptParty, acceptQuote is true for both the requests , When Payee fsp sends success response for one of the transfers and a failure response for the other transfer, Then the callback response should have the party and quote results for the transfer that payee fsp sent failure response and for the other transfer where payee fsp sent the transfer response should has party, quote and transfer results

assertions.description: Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check overall bulk transaction state is COMPLETED

test_cases.name: TC-BT5. Given partyLookup is skipped And there are 2 transfers with the same receiver fspid in the request, And acceptParty is true for both the transfers And acceptQuote is false for one of the requests and true for the other request, Then the callback response should only have the party and quote results for the transfer that has acceptQuote false and for the other transfer has party, quote and transfer results

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response MSISDN is same as in the request
Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response has ilpPacket and condition
Check overall bulk transaction state is COMPLETED
